programme.desc: Three women who advertised erotic services on Craiglist are assaulted, on of them is killed; surveillance video and witness reports match a man who no one would ever suspect to be a killer.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: When government intern Chandra Levy goes missing, detectives discover she may have been having an affair with a senator; a man in jail claims he has information.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Twenty years after a woman was killed at home, an LAPD officer opens the cold case file and sees the murder was staged to look like a robbery and the killer could actually be a cop.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: When four women are killed at different times in different states after going home from a bar with a handsome young man dressed like a cowboy, detectives don't realize the murders are linked together.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Four-dozen women are murdered in Washington State, and five of the victims found in the Green River.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: When a law school student is strangled to death in her bed, detectives discover that someone she knew extremely well had been secretly watching her for months by videotaping her through her second story window.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A promising young attorney is shot and killed in a jealous rage by an obsessed, on-again off-again girlfriend.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A short order cook falls on hard times and returns to what he knows best, stick ups; his armed robberies result in a ruthless spree of killing fast food workers.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Out on parole, an ex-con turned published author goes on a 24-hour killing spree, but when he unknowingly leaves one of his victims alive to identify him, cops launch a multi state manhunt and bring him to justice.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A jealous bodybuilder who paid to have his rival killed turns up half a world away after a decade of hiding from law enforcement.

programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire doctor's wife sets off a massive manhunt throughout New England; law enforcement quickly locates the suspected killer only to find out he has a history of not only violence but also cross-dressing.

programme.desc: A murder mystery play becomes a reality for a married couple on a Valentine's Day date at an oceanfront resort.

programme.desc: The brutal murder of a British soldier by radical Muslims on a London street is caught on tape; the Lackawanna Six go to terrorist training camp to prepare for holy war.

programme.desc: HS football coach Ed Thomas is a legend in Parkersburg, Iowa, who had mentored multiple players into the NFL, and kids even had a poster of him on their walls; when he is gunned down during an early morning workout, the entire town is shocked.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: On the surface the Carters seemed like a happy family of Iowa farmers, but when they discover Shirley Carter shot to death in her kitchen, the family begins pointing fingers at each other.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall

programme.desc: Police charge a filmmaker with murder after investigating allegations that the plot of his latest movie was identical to recent crimes.
